alarms.description: Parameter change requires power cycle to take effect
causes: Parameter was changed that requires restart

alarms.description: Parity error detected in tape or RS232 communication
alarms.quick_fix: Check cable connections and resend program

alarms.description: Character count error in received data
Number in program exceeds maximum allowed digits
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce decimal places or numeric value

alarms.description: Required address letter is missing from block
causes: Missing X, Y, Z, or other required address
alarms.quick_fix: Add required address (X, Y, Z, etc.)

alarms.description: Address letter has no numeric value following it
alarms.quick_fix: Add numeric value after address letter

alarms.description: Negative value used where only positive is allowed
Decimal point used where not allowed

causes: G-code not available on this control
alarms.quick_fix: Check G-code validity for this control

causes: Missing F word in cutting block

alarms.description: Spindle speed is zero or invalid
More simultaneous axes than control allows
causes: Too many axes in single block

alarms.description: X axis interpolation error exceeded tolerance
Y axis interpolation error exceeded tolerance
Z axis interpolation error exceeded tolerance
Invalid dwell value in G04 command
causes: P or X value missing or invalid

alarms.description: Division by zero attempted in macro
alarms.quick_fix: Add zero check before division operation

alarms.description: Invalid address letter in macro call
causes: Using G, L, N, O, or P as argument
END statement missing or wrong number

alarms.description: GOTO target N number not found
Subprogram does not end with M99
causes: M99 missing at end of subprogram
alarms.quick_fix: Add M99 to end of subprogram

alarms.description: M98/G65 called program does not exist
alarms.quick_fix: Load program or correct program number

alarms.description: Too many levels of subprogram nesting
X axis servo ready signal is off
alarms.quick_fix: Check X servo amplifier and connections

alarms.description: Y axis servo ready signal is off
alarms.quick_fix: Check Y servo amplifier and connections

alarms.description: Z axis servo ready signal is off
alarms.quick_fix: Check Z servo amplifier and connections

alarms.description: X axis position error exceeded tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce feedrate, check mechanics, verify servo parameters

alarms.description: Y axis position error exceeded tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce feedrate, check mechanics, verify servo parameters

alarms.description: Z axis position error exceeded tolerance
alarms.quick_fix: Reduce feedrate, check mechanics, verify servo parameters
Check axis parameters against motor specifications

alarms.description: X axis servo motor is overheating
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling time, reduce load or duty cycle

alarms.description: Y axis servo motor is overheating
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling time, reduce load or duty cycle

alarms.description: Z axis servo motor is overheating
alarms.quick_fix: Allow cooling time, reduce load or duty cycle
Allow cooling time, reduce load or duty cycle

alarms.description: X axis exceeded software travel limit
alarms.quick_fix: Move inside limits, check work offset

alarms.description: Y axis exceeded software travel limit
alarms.quick_fix: Move inside limits, check work offset

alarms.description: Z axis exceeded software travel limit
alarms.quick_fix: Move inside limits, check work offset

alarms.description: X axis hit positive hardware limit switch
causes: Axis traveled too far in +X direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in -X direction while holding OT release

alarms.description: X axis hit negative hardware limit switch
causes: Axis traveled too far in -X direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in +X direction while holding OT release

alarms.description: Y axis hit positive hardware limit switch
causes: Axis traveled too far in +Y direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in -Y direction while holding OT release

alarms.description: Y axis hit negative hardware limit switch
causes: Axis traveled too far in -Y direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in +Y direction while holding OT release

alarms.description: Z axis hit positive hardware limit switch
causes: Axis traveled too far in +Z direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in -Z direction while holding OT release

alarms.description: Z axis hit negative hardware limit switch
causes: Axis traveled too far in -Z direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in +Z direction while holding OT release

causes: Axis traveled too far in positive direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in negative direction while holding OT release

causes: Axis traveled too far in negative direction
alarms.quick_fix: Jog axis in positive direction while holding OT release

alarms.description: X+ software limit exceeded in auto mode
alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits

alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits

alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits

alarms.quick_fix: Modify program to stay within limits
Allow spindle to cool, reduce speed or load
Reduce cutting load, check tool condition

alarms.description: Spindle drive detected a fault condition
Spindle did not reach commanded speed in time
Spindle gear change did not complete
Automatic tool changer is not in ready state
alarms.quick_fix: Check ATC ready signal and interlocks

alarms.description: Tool change arm is not in home position
alarms.quick_fix: Move arm to home position manually or via reset

alarms.description: Tool magazine is not in position
Tool change sequence exceeded time limit
Tool clamp confirmation signal not received

alarms.quick_fix: Move Z to tool change position

alarms.description: Spindle is not oriented for tool change
ATC arm rotation did not complete

alarms.description: Same tool number registered in multiple pockets
alarms.quick_fix: Correct tool table to remove duplicates

alarms.quick_fix: Reduce feedrate, check for mechanical binding
